1. Another High-End Chinese GPU Emerges Online — Moore Threads MTT S90 Reportedly Outperforms NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 With Solid Gaming Performance  Wccftech
  2. Lisuan G100 GPU shows promise, at least in OpenCL — homegrown Chinese chip outguns Arc A770 and RTX 4060 in new benchmark, 10% slower than RTX 5060  Tom's Hardware
  3. Lisuan Tech Unveils 7G106—China's First 6 Nanometer Gaming GPU  TechPowerUp
  4. Lisuan’s 6 nm domestic GPUs rival RTX 4060 performance, driving China’s gaming and AI self‑sufficiency  Notebookcheck
  5. Chinese Lisuan 7G106 GPU Shown Running Black Myth Wukong At 4K  Lowyat.NET
